senselogic.sitevision.api.cookie

Interface SiteCookieUtil


  • @Requireable(value="SiteCookieUtil")
public interface SiteCookieUtil
    Site cookie utility interface.

    Contains methods for retrieving sv:siteCookie Nodes of current site and current user's consent status of them.

    An instance of the Sitevision class implementing this interface can be obtained via Utils.getSiteCookieUtil(). See Utils for how to obtain an instance of the Utils interface.

    Since:
    Sitevision 9.1
    Author:
    Karl Ekl√∂f
    See Also:
    ResourceLocatorUtil.getSiteCookieRepository()

      • getNecessarySiteCookies

        List<Node> getNecessarySiteCookies()
        Necessary Site cookies (sv:siteCookie) of current site.
        Returns:
        the necessary site cookies of current site, or empty list if current site has no site cookies

      • resolveSiteCookieByIdentifier

        Node resolveSiteCookieByIdentifier(String aCookieIdentifier)
        Convenience method that resolves a sv:siteCookie Node from a given cookie identifier.
        Parameters:
        aCookieIdentifier - the site cookie identifier
        Returns:
        the sv:siteCookie Node with the "cookieIdentifier" property that matches aCookieIdentifier. Returns null if aCookieIdentifier is null, blank or indeterminable

      • checkUserConsent

        boolean checkUserConsent(Node aSiteCookie)
        Checks whether or not current user explicitly has accepted a specific site cookie.
        Parameters:
        aSiteCookie - the sv:siteCookie
        Returns:
        true if current user has accepted aSiteCookie, false otherwise

      • hasPendingUserConsents

        boolean hasPendingUserConsents()
        Whether or not current user has explicitly accepted/rejected all "user selectable" site cookies.
        Returns:
        true if there are site cookies that current user hasn't yet accepted/rejected, false otherwise
        See Also:
        hasUserConsentCookie()

      • hasUserConsentCookie

        boolean hasUserConsentCookie()
        Whether or not current user has a consent cookie.
        Returns:
        true if current user has a consent cookie set, false otherwise
        See Also:
        hasPendingUserConsents()

      • getUserConsentCookieName

        String getUserConsentCookieName()
        The name of the cookie that contains data about site cookie consents.
        Returns:
        the name of the cookie that contains data about site cookie consents

      • createUserConsentCookieValue

        String createUserConsentCookieValue(List<Node> aAllowCookieIdList)
                             throws IllegalArgumentException
        Generates a consent string that can be saved as cookie value for the cookie named getUserConsentCookieName().

        Note! All "user selectable" sv:siteCookie Nodes that are not present in aAllowCookieIdList will be treated as rejected.

        Parameters:
        aAllowCookieIdList - the list of sv:siteCookie accepted by current user
        Returns:
        a string that represents the accept/reject status for current sv:siteCookie's
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if aAllowCookieIdList is null or contains other than sv:siteCookie Nodes

      • getUserConsents

        List<Node> getUserConsents()
        Gets all sv:siteCookie nodes that current user has accepted.
        Returns:
        the list of sv:siteCookie Nodes current user has accepted. Returns empty list if site has no site cookies or if current user hasn't accepted any sv:siteCookie

Sitevision - Portal and Content Management Made Easy
Sitevision is an advanced Java enterprise portal product and a portlet container (JSR 286) that implements Java Content Repository (JSR 283).
